data.what_is:
User.com is an all-in-one Marketing Automation platform aimed at boosting engagement and improving conversion by using a single data source for your customers. Reach clients through a wide range of communication channels: email, live chat, chatbot, push notifications, dynamic page content, and many more - all available in one place. 

Interested in Marketing Automation? Grab our free 14-day trial with no upfront payment: http://bit.ly/2wrc3Ax

We offer various integrations - Easily connect to Google Tag Manager, Zapier, Segment, Google Analytics, Wordpress, Magento, PrestaShop, JavaScript, CSV, Gmail, Freshmail, Email Labs, plus a range of many more! For a full list see our integrations page here: http://bit.ly/38Dsxn2

As a real-time customer and engagement tool for small and large businesses alike, User.com has been designed to maximize conversion rates and grow user satisfaction.

With intuitive drag & drop tools, you can build marketing automation processes, marketing campaigns and create automated action paths that will continuously engage your customers. Use Triggers, Conditions, and Actions to deliver personalized messages to your users at the right time.

We understand how important it is to have ongoing engagement with your users in real-time - With the integration of our live chat tool, you can connect in real-time and worldwide. All conversations are stored and connected. Lookup at anytime the latest messages - and send the updates to users via email with simple connections between them.

initial_reviews.review_title: More than just a live chat
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
We are using User.com to build automations, marketing, and send push notifications to the users. The interface of the platform is simple, and clean. You don't need to be a Dev to start using User.com as it can be used by anyone like me (I'm not a Dev). It is easier to integrate with other platforms, and the customization options are great, email and push notifications delivery is good.

What do you dislike about User.com?
No issues, but we are not using it for a live chat support. Because, the Live Chat widget has some bugs, and reported by our clients frequently, so we have started to use another platform live chat support.

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using User.com to send promotional emails, and push notifications to our users. Since it's all available in the same platform, we can able to save time by completing such tasks.

initial_reviews.review_title: Complete Package with seemingly unlimited potential!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
User.com is great in many ways, not least with their customer support and willingness to help out. Overall, this is a one stop shop for so many things so for me, I like the fact that user.com offers so many solutions to so many problems.

What do you dislike about User.com?
The learning curve can be sharp at the start and some of the tutorials are a bit out of date, but these are nitpicking!

Recommendations to others considering User.com:
Give it a go, and give yourself the time to adjust to the learning curve (it isn't that bad!). I had multiple sessions for different elements of the tool so my understanding increased bit by bit.

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a CRM system, automated emails based on user behaviour, landing pages for unique customer experiences, chatbots, support documents. Honestly, so many problems!

initial_reviews.review_title: User.com is a superb all-in-one marketing automation tool
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
I just simply love tools that make my life easier! And user.com is definitely one of them! I have everything that I need in one place, and that allows our team to be more organized and user-oriented. We can now focus our energy and resources on our customers, instead of running between different tools and trying to find data.  I can definitely recommend this to any sales/marketing/customer success teams - user.com is safe, gdpr compliant, affordable and easy to learn and to use.

What do you dislike about User.com?
Just two extra features in 'Conversations' and it would be ideal:
- possibility to search previous chats by keywords
- would be great if Grammarly  could work in the chat (to prevent mistypes in real-time)

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using User.com to welcome, onboard, support and reengage our users and customers.
It's pretty easy-to-use, therefore we were able to save up time to do other tasks.
I am amazed by the fact, that this tool was able to help us simplify our daily task enormously.

all_reviews.review_title: User.com is a superb all-in-one marketing automation tool
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
I just simply love tools that make my life easier! And user.com is definitely one of them! I have everything that I need in one place, and that allows our team to be more organized and user-oriented. We can now focus our energy and resources on our customers, instead of running between different tools and trying to find data.  I can definitely recommend this to any sales/marketing/customer success teams - user.com is safe, gdpr compliant, affordable and easy to learn and to use.

What do you dislike about User.com?
Just two extra features in 'Conversations' and it would be ideal:
- possibility to search previous chats by keywords
- would be great if Grammarly  could work in the chat (to prevent mistypes in real-time)

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are using User.com to welcome, onboard, support and reengage our users and customers.
It's pretty easy-to-use, therefore we were able to save up time to do other tasks.
I am amazed by the fact, that this tool was able to help us simplify our daily task enormously.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful tool for a reasonable price
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
After switching from intercom I was afraid if User.com will be a great match. A few weeks later I'm sure, that it's great tool with almost unlimited options.
What's best in User.com?
- great drag & drop in automation
- easy to use and customizable live chat option
- experienced customer success team always willing to help and troubleshoot  your problems

What do you dislike about User.com?
Support Center - could be full of screencast or GIF explaining how to set up some automation, not only articles.
In the past, we had several minor bugs but always reported it and received a fast reply that task was solved by their IT team!

Recommendations to others considering User.com:
Contact User.com team and discuss with them your case. They're always happy to help and present you other use cases from other clients that migrated from other tools.
Greatest value was to talk to their support team and ask for some recommendations.
Also - if you are trying to migrate from other tools and you're simply afraid to lose anything - talk openly to their team to get instructions. I can highly recommend talking to Maciej  - best User.com expert!

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
SaaS onboarding process via emails, popups, etc.; CRM; emailing to the user base and Live Chat.
The tool itself is powerful and you can play with it for many hours to discover countless options on how to improve your marketing automation. The support team is always there to help you and recommend some new automation.

all_reviews.review_title: UserEngage has been super beneficial to our business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
Our platform, The-Collectory.com, is a members-only site focusing on luxury goods. With the help of UserEngage, we can easily understand the behavior of each and every one of our members, and therefore, deliver an extremely well-tailored and personalized customer service experience.

What do you dislike about User.com?
The pricing structure. I don't like to pay per user because it incentivizes me to have less users. There are some features I don't use and would rather to pay per feature or some other structure. There have also been some kinks and bugs.

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are in the luxury business, so for us it's all about knowing and anticipating all of the needs of our clients. With UserEngage, we are able to track behavior, message and engage with clients. With the amount of information we learn from our clients (who they are, where are they visitng from, what they care about, etc.) we are able to deliver a truly personal shopping experience.

all_reviews.review_title: Great software to track and interact with visitors and users.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
Great support team, they are continuously improving their software and keep you well informed with their onboarding functions.

Also I like the way you can create automated communication paths that help to engage with customers.

In the new app they have added dashboards which can be organized based upon personal preferences. I have not worked with it yet but it looks awesome!

What do you dislike about User.com?
The CRM function is not user friendly. Additionally it would be great if UE would develop a Chrome plugin that can be connected to email account. They want you to do all communication form UE but this is just not possible.

Recommendations to others considering User.com:
Please ask support to help you set up UserEngage, if you are not techsavvy it can take sometime.

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated onboarding processes. A/B testing with modules/pop ups and set automated activities based upon visitors behavior.

all_reviews.review_title: Its good and smart, but not perfect...
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about User.com?
Finding a CRM and Marketing that fits with our business is a very difficult task ... Budget, integrations, advantages, resources, support ... It's like a magic soup. We have a Marketplace, and we need a CRM that fits perfectly with WooCommerce.

After testing 5 different SaaS, UserEngage seemed to be the best option ... It seemed ...
We tested some functions and found that the software is full of bugs, very poorly coded and the support is disqualified ... Although having a great interface mainly in automation and the chat features to be good, good would not be great. The only recommendation I would give to anyone is that they test, test well before entering their credit card.

What do you dislike about User.com?
In a single week, the system went out of the air for 3 times ... This is very serious because the UserEngage code is added at the top of the page ... And when their system gets out of the Air, Locked up our entire website. And another very serious problem... They claim to have integration with WooCommerce, but the supplied plugin simply gives a critical error once the user makes the purchase on our site, scaring all our buyers. After spending days trying to talk to support to fix the bug, support said it fixed the problem. But in reality they had not changed ANYTHING in the script, and the error persisted ... After we lost our patience, and the UserEngage support saying "that the problem was not with them and cant reproduce the error!", we went to look what was wrong with the plugin they provide and we had found the error in less than 1 minute ... Why days to solve and still not resolved? After showing the error to the Site Administrator, they promised to correct the error in the next month ... Come on, we do not have time for this ... We spend a lot of money with paid ads and is trowing away money if the site doesn't work... Beware of misleading advertising, they promises a lot of functions, but some are just not working ... And another thing, if you want to customize your forms, popups and emails, you can prepare to have a very experienced programmer as the task is not simple. The SSL connection with e-mail its not working too...

UserEngage is not bad and I believe in potential, but now, it does not work for us ...

Recommendations to others considering User.com:
Search and test, a lot!!!

What problems is User.com solving and how is that benefiting you?
A lot of default functions included, WHEN IT WORKS, and chat and helpdesk included...
